ISABMutex Class Reference

Detailed Description

Critical section class.

This class can NOT handle recursive locks, use ISABRecursiveMutex if you want to do that.

Definition at line 261 of file ISABThread.h.

Member Function Documentation

void ISABMutex::lock (   )  const [inline]
 

Locks the mutex.

If the mutex is already locked, the calling thread blocks until the mutex is unlocked. If the current owner of the mutex's lock attempts to relock the mutex a deadlock may result.

Definition at line 590 of file ISABThread.h.

Referenced by FOBC::getFile(), ModulePushList::has(), ModulePushList::insert(), and ModulePushList::remove().

void ISABMutex::unlock (   )  const [inline]
 

Unlocks the mutex.

This function is called by the owner of the mutex's lock to release it. If the caller doesn't have the mutex's lock then the behaviour is undefined.
